Created an attachment (id=15527)
new JAR

Please replace the pde.jar in the org.eclipse.pde plugin with this attachment
and you will be fine.

Fixed.
For now, please place the JAR attached in the org.eclipse.pde plugin of 
today's build to stop seeing those NPEs
